MCQ: Which scientific field studies the fundamental biological processes that occur in living organisms?
Choices: a: Physics | b: Chemistry | c: Biology | d: Mathematics

MCQ: Which major theme of biology explains the unity and diversity of life?
Choices: a: Cellular structure and function | b: Evolution | c: Metabolism | d: Reproduction

MCQ: Which of the following is not a major theme of biology?
Choices: a: Cellular structure and function | b: Energy processing | c: Regulation of internal environments | d: Photosynthesis

MCQ: Which organisms do not have a nucleus in their cells?
Choices: a: Archaea | b: Bacteria | c: Plants | d: Fungi

MCQ: Which of the following organisms is not a part of the eukaryotic domain?
Choices: a: Fungi | b: Plants | c: Protists | d: Animals
